subject: Ice Skating
Figure Skating
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: After winning the silver medal at the 2010 Vancouver Olympics with a flawed jumping technique, Mao Asada has restored herself among the gold medal favorites for the Sochi Games.
snippet: After winning the silver medal at the 2010 Vancouver Olympics with a flawed jumping technique, Mao Asada has restored herself among the gold medal favorites for the Sochi Games.
